comments: I loved this class! I never thought I could understand math - she made it so clear and easy to get. And if you do the homework, you will know the subject enough to do well in the class. She is a nice person too - really cares about her students.

Mrs. Weingarten is a very nice person, but very difficult teacher. She really expects alot from students. Class attendance is mandatory. She gives alot of HW, plus checks everyday. Quizzes/tests aren\'t too bad, gets problems from HW. Textbook teacher, use book alot. Also if you\'re failing, you\'re out of luck. Wouldn\'t recommend if bad at math.

she is a very very good teacher. one of the best math teachers i have ever had. she knows how to explain things clearly and cares about her students. She is always willing to help with any questions or problem any one of her students has. a terrific teacher!!! i would definitely recommend having her
I am a freshman at Brookdale. This math professor is awesome. She is the sweetest person and is very helpful. Taught me more than my high school teachers about math. Thanks again. See you in 021!
really nice teacher - cares about all her students - explains very well - got an A!

Great professor! She told us how to get an A in her class - do the homework - tests come from homework - got an A- very helpful-explains things so much more clearly than I learned in high school- best math teacher!

She was absolutely awful! i had her last fall for prealgebra and she spent the entire class talking about her kids. she always gave us notebook checks. I am in college not middle school if i wanted to be babysat i would of hired one! i hated going to her class

You have to do your homework in this class - everyone who comes prepared gets good grades. all of us who didn\'t do their homework failed the class because the test problems came from homework. if yu do the homeowrk you can do really well in this class because she makes the material very easy to learn. she explains everything really well.

One of the best math teachers I\'ve ever had. She is always asking if anyone has any questions to make sure that everyone understands the current topic. She emphasizes good study habitsand details exactly what to study -gives prices for top scores. I\'ve taken her 012 and 021 class and have had A\'s in both!

she is not very helpful she also judge her students in front of the class and accuse you of not doing your homework but you did it and still wont understand she still not helpfull and she is rude to students that have a hard time in class I wouldnt take her.
Worst math teacher in the college. She talks about other students right in front of the class. Very unprofessinal..

shes alwasy comparing u to her kids its annoying! she compares our learning skills to her kids. she has no discretion at all she will tell you your failing in front of everyone. shes the worst at teaching this if it wasn\'t for me reading my book i dont think i would have learned a thing!
